participant_1.background:
I want to find a companion to share my love of Christmas with.
I enjoy getting my nails done as a way to relax and pamper myself.
I love nature and my rose garden is one of my favorite places to be.
i like spending time with friends playing sports and going to country concerts.
I love the feeling of being free to speak my mind, even if it is not always appropriate.

participant_2.background:
I love reading and writing about animals, so my favorite websites are those that feature stories about pets and animal rescue.
i had to get a job early as a child.
I'm a fan of Jimmy Fallon and the Raptors but I'm not much of a cook.
i hate tomatoes.
I'm not good at keeping up with my family, but I always stay in touch with my dog.

content.text: Hey there! What are your hobbies?
I like reading and writing about animals, especially pet and animal rescue stories.
That's cool! I have a rose garden that I love spending time in.
Wow, that sounds really relaxing. I do like flowers.
Me too! I love their colors and scents.
I like roses, lilies, and sunflowers.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like watching Jimmy Fallon and the Raptors play basketball.
I like Jimmy Fallon too! He's so funny.
Have you ever been to a Raptors game?
No, I haven't. I've always wanted to go to one though.
They're a lot of fun! It's a great atmosphere.
I bet it is. I'll have to try to go to one sometime.
You should! It'll be a great time
